name: CBMutableCharacteristic
desc: A characteristic of a local peripheral’s service.

items.name: init(type: CBUUID, properties: CBCharacteristicProperties, value: Data?, permissions: CBAttributePermissions)
items.desc: Creates a mutable characteristic with specified permissions, properties, and value.

items.name: var descriptors: [CBDescriptor]?
items.desc: An array of the characteristic’s descriptors.

items.name: var permissions: CBAttributePermissions
items.desc: The permissions of the characteristic value.

items.name: struct CBAttributePermissions
items.desc: Values that represent the read, write, and encryption permissions for a characteristic’s value.

items.name: var subscribedCentrals: [CBCentral]?
items.desc: A list of centrals that are currently subscribed to the characteristic’s value.
